verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to me,<WH3212> "Go again,<WH157> love a woman<WH802> loved<WH157> by another,<WH7453> and an adulteress,<WH5003> even as Yahweh<WH3068> loves<WH160> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> though they turn<WH6437> to other<WH312> gods,<WH430> and love<WH157> cakes<WH809> of raisins.<WH6025>"
So I bought<WH3739> her for myself for fifteen<WH6240> pieces of silver<WH3701> and a homer<WH2563> and a half<WH3963> of barley.<WH8184>

I said<WH559> to her,<WH3427> "You shall stay with me many<WH7227> days.<WH3117> You shall not play the prostitute,<WH2181> and you shall not be<WH1961> with any other man.<WH376> I will also be so toward you."

For the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall live<WH3427> many<WH7227> days<WH3117> without king,<WH4428> and without prince,<WH8269> and without sacrifice,<WH2077> and without sacred stone,<WH4676> and without ephod<WH646> or idols.<WH8655>

Afterward<WH310> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall return,<WH7725> and seek<WH1245> Yahweh<WH3068> their God,<WH430> and David<WH1732> their king,<WH4428> and shall come with trembling<WH6342> to Yahweh<WH3068> and to his blessings<WH2898> in the last<WH319> days.<WH3117>
